others: lungs with distinct edges and vasculature
shoulder blades and upper arm bones
soft tissue with varying densities and textures
mediastinum: a region in the thoracic cavity between the lungs
appears as a vertical, white or light-colored area on an x-ray
contains major blood vessels, trachea, esophagus, and other structures
typically narrower at the top and wider at the bottom
can be differentiated from the lungs by its higher opacity and distinct shape
